name: Churn Prediction Business User App
description: Churn prediction employs a previously trained model to identify which customers are likely to churn based on historical data.

appStages.name: Introduction
appStages.stageDetails:
{
  "components": [
    {
      "label": "HTML",
      "attrs": [
        {
          "attr": "",
          "value": ""
        }
      ],
      "content": "\u003cdiv style\u003d\"border-radius: 5px; font-family: \u0027Roboto\u0027, sans-serif;margin:-30px -18px 15px -18px;\"\u003e\r\n    \u003cdiv style\u003d\"padding: 0.75rem 1.25rem; margin-bottom: 0; background-color: #fff;\r\n    border-bottom: 1px solid rgba(30, 30, 30, 0.125); border-top-right-radius: 5px; border-top-left-radius: 5px;\r\n    color: #ffffff; display: flex; align-items: center; gap: 20px;\"\u003e\r\n    \r\n        \u003cimg src\u003d\"data:image/svg+xml;base64,\u003d\" alt\u003d\"\"\r\n        alt\u003d\"App Icon\" \r\n        style\u003d\"width: 30px; height: 30px; margin-left: 20px;margin-top:-10px\"\u003e\r\n\r\n        \u003ch3 style\u003d\"color: #1E1E1E; font-size: 28px; font-weight: 500; margin-left: -10px;\"\u003e\r\n            Churn Prediction Analytical App\r\n        \u003c/h3\u003e\r\n    \u003c/div\u003e\r\n    \r\n    \u003cdiv style\u003d\"flex: 1 1 auto; padding: 1.25rem; padding-bottom: 0;\"\u003e\r\n        \u003cdiv style\u003d\"display: flex; align-items: center; margin-left:1px;\"\u003e\r\n            \r\n            \u003cdiv style\u003d\"margin-left:60px\"\u003e\r\n                \u003ch4 style\u003d\"color: #3178d6; font-size: 20px; font-weight: 400;\"\u003eOverview\u003c/h4\u003e\r\n                \u003cp style\u003d\"margin-top: 10px; text-align: justify; font-size: 16px;\"\u003e\r\n                   Analytical app empowers businesses to predict customer churn and identify subscription renewal opportunities accurately. Using advanced machine learning, it analyzes customer data to provide actionable insights, enabling proactive retention strategies and sustainable growth. With a user-friendly interface, businesses can easily leverage their data to make informed decisions and stay ahead of the competition.\r\n                \u003c/p\u003e\r\n            \u003c/div\u003e\r\n        \u003c/div\u003e\r\n\r\n        \u003cdiv style\u003d\"margin-top: 20px; margin-left: 60px;\"\u003e\r\n            \u003ch4 style\u003d\"color: #3178d6; font-size: 20px; font-weight: 400;\"\u003eKey Features\r\n\u003c/h4\u003e\r\n            \u003cul style\u003d\"list-style-type: none; padding: 0; font-size: 16px;margin-top:10px;\"\u003e\r\n                \u003cli style\u003d\"display: flex; align-items: center; margin-bottom: 10px;\"\u003e\r\n                    \u003cspan style\u003d\"width: 13px; height: 13px; background-color: #ADE8F2 !important; color: #fff; border-radius: 50%;\r\n                    display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-size: 10px; font-weight: 600; margin-right: 10px;\"\u003e+\u003c/span\u003e\r\n                   Predictive Churn Analysis: Easily upload data and accurately predict customer churn, distinguishing between potential churners and loyal customers.\r\n                 \u003c/li\u003e\r\n                \u003cli style\u003d\"display: flex; align-items: center; margin-bottom: 10px;\"\u003e\r\n                    \u003cspan style\u003d\"width: 13px; height: 13px; background-color: #ADE8F2 !important; color: #fff; border-radius: 50%;\r\n                    display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-size: 10px; font-weight: 600; margin-right: 10px;\"\u003e+\u003c/span\u003e\r\n                    Actionable Insights: Utilize advanced machine learning algorithms to gain predictive insights, empowering proactive retention strategies and resource optimization for sustainable growth.\r\n                 \u003c/li\u003e\r\n            \u003c/ul\u003e\r\n        \u003c/div\u003e\r\n\r\n        \u003cdiv style\u003d\"margin-top: 20px; margin-left: 60px;\"\u003e\r\n            \u003ch4 style\u003d\"color: #3178d6; font-size: 20px; font-weight: 400;\"\u003eKey Insights\r\n\u003c/h4\u003e\r\n           \u003cul style\u003d\"list-style-type: none; padding: 0; font-size: 16px;margin-top:10px;\"\u003e\r\n                \u003cli style\u003d\"display: flex; align-items: center; margin-bottom: 10px;\"\u003e\r\n                    \u003cspan style\u003d\"width: 13px; height: 13px; background-color: #ADE8F2 !important; color: #fff; border-radius: 50%;\r\n                    display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-size: 10px; font-weight: 600; margin-right: 10px;\"\u003e+\u003c/span\u003e\r\n                   Proactive Retention Strategies: By accurately predicting customer churn, businesses can proactively intervene to retain at-risk customers, reducing churn rates and preserving revenue streams.\r\n                \u003c/li\u003e\r\n                \u003cli style\u003d\"display: flex; align-items: center; margin-bottom: 10px;\"\u003e\r\n                    \u003cspan style\u003d\"width: 13px; height: 13px; background-color: #ADE8F2 !important; color: #fff; border-radius: 50%;\r\n                    display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-size: 10px; font-weight: 600; margin-right: 10px;\"\u003e+\u003c/span\u003e\r\n                    Resource Optimization: Leveraging predictive insights enables businesses to allocate resources more efficiently, focusing efforts on retaining valuable customers while minimizing investment in less profitable segments.\r\n                \u003c/li\u003e\r\n                \u003cli style\u003d\"display: flex; align-items: center; margin-bottom: 10px;\"\u003e\r\n                    \u003cspan style\u003d\"width: 13px; height: 13px; background-color: #ADE8F2 !important; color: #fff; border-radius: 50%;\r\n                    display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-size: 10px; font-weight: 600; margin-right: 10px;\"\u003e+\u003c/span\u003e\r\n                  Transaction distribution of probable churning customer\r\n                \u003c/li\u003e\r\n                \u003cli style\u003d\"display: flex; align-items: center; margin-bottom: 10px;\"\u003e\r\n                    \u003cspan style\u003d\"width: 13px; height: 13px; background-color: #ADE8F2 !important; color: #fff; border-radius: 50%;\r\n                    display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-size: 10px; font-weight: 600; margin-right: 10px;\"\u003e+\u003c/span\u003e\r\n                   Sustainable Growth: With the ability to distinguish between potential churners and loyal customers, businesses can implement targeted retention strategies, fostering long-term customer relationships and driving sustainable growth.\r\n                \u003c/li\u003e\r\n            \u003c/ul\u003e\r\n        \u003c/div\u003e\r\n    \u003c/div\u003e\r\n\u003c/div\u003e\r\n",

      "content": "\u003cdiv style\u003d\"border-radius: 5px; font-family: \u0027Roboto\u0027, sans-serif;margin:-30px -18px 15px -18px;\"\u003e\r\n    \u003cdiv style\u003d\"padding: 0.75rem 1.25rem; margin-bottom: 0; background-color: #fff;\r\n    border-bottom: 1px solid rgba(30, 30, 30, 0.125); border-top-right-radius: 5px; border-top-left-radius: 5px;\r\n    color: #ffffff; display: flex; align-items: center; gap: 20px;\"\u003e\r\n        \r\n        \u003ch3 style\u003d\"color: #1E1E1E; font-size: 28px; font-weight: 500; margin-left: 20px;\"\u003e\r\n            Churn Prediction\r\n\r\n\r\n        \u003c/h3\u003e\r\n    \u003c/div\u003e\r\n\u003c/div\u003e\r\n",
      "refreshOnChange": false,
      "key": "html3",
      "type": "htmlelement",
      "input": false,
      "tableView": false
    },
    {
      "label": "Columns",
      "columns": [

          "components": [

              "content": "\u003ch4 style\u003d\"color: #3178d6; font-size: 20px;margin-left:-2pxpx;font-weight: 400;\"\u003eActionable items\u003c/h4\u003e",
              "refreshOnChange": false,
              "key": "html8",
              "type": "htmlelement",
              "input": false,
              "tableView": false
            },
            {
              "label": "HTML",
              "attrs": [
                {
                  "attr": "",
                  "value": ""
                }
              ],
              "content": "\u003cdiv style\u003d\"display: flex; margin:-30px -18px 15px -18px; font-family\"\u003e\r\n    \u003cdiv style\u003d\"border-radius: 5px; font-family: Roboto; margin-top: 10px; margin-left: 15px;\"\u003e\r\n        \u003cdiv style\u003d\"margin-top: 20px; margin-left: 3px;\"\u003e\r\n            \r\n            \u003cul style\u003d\"list-style-type: none; padding: 0; font-size: 16px; margin-top: 10px;\"\u003e\r\n                \u003cli style\u003d\"display: flex; align-items: center; margin-bottom: 10px;\"\u003e\r\n                    \u003cspan style\u003d\"width: 13px; height: 13px; background-color: #ADE8F2 !important; color: #FFFFFF; \r\n                        border-radius: 50%; display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; \r\n                        font-size: 12px; font-weight: bold; margin-right: 10px;\"\u003e+\u003c/span\u003e\r\n                    Upload new data for churn prediction\r\n\r\n                \u003c/li\u003e\r\n                \u003cli style\u003d\"display: flex; align-items: center; margin-bottom: 10px;\"\u003e\r\n                    \u003cspan style\u003d\"width: 13px; height: 13px; background-color: #ADE8F2 !important; color: #FFFFFF; \r\n                        border-radius: 50%; display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; \r\n                        font-size: 12px; font-weight: bold; margin-right: 10px;\"\u003e+\u003c/span\u003e\r\n                    Show the path to the prediction input dataset\r\n\r\n                \u003c/li\u003e\r\n                \u003cli style\u003d\"display: flex; align-items: center; margin-bottom: 10px;\"\u003e\r\n                    \u003cspan style\u003d\"width: 13px; height: 13px; background-color: #ADE8F2 !important; color: #FFFFFF; \r\n                        border-radius: 50%; display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; \r\n                        font-size: 12px; font-weight: bold; margin-right: 10px;\"\u003e+\u003c/span\u003e\r\n                    Prediction input data must have same schema as used in training model.\r\n\r\n\r\n                \u003c/li\u003e\r\n                \u003cli style\u003d\"display: flex; align-items: center; margin-bottom: 10px;\"\u003e\r\n                    \u003cspan style\u003d\"width: 13px; height: 13px; background-color: #ADE8F2 !important; color: #FFFFFF; \r\n                        border-radius: 50%; display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; \r\n                        font-size: 12px; font-weight: bold; margin-right: 10px;\"\u003e+\u003c/span\u003e\r\n                    Click Run Prediction to perform prediction on the given dataset. Ensure same features are used to train the selected model and perform the prediction.\r\n\r\n\r\n                \u003c/li\u003e\r\n                \u003cli style\u003d\"display: flex; align-items: center; margin-bottom: 10px;\"\u003e\r\n                    \u003cspan style\u003d\"width: 13px; height: 13px; background-color: #ADE8F2 !important; color: #FFFFFF; \r\n                        border-radius: 50%; display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; \r\n                        font-size: 12px; font-weight: bold; margin-right: 10px;\"\u003e+\u003c/span\u003e\r\n                   View the charts for Predictive Analytics in the output. It shows the distribution of customers and aggregated transactions across different categories\r\n\r\n                \u003c/li\u003e\r\n               \r\n                \r\n            \u003c/ul\u003e\r\n        \u003c/div\u003e\r\n\r\n        \r\n\r\n        \r\n    \u003c/div\u003e\r\n\u003c/div\u003e\r\n",
